name: C. Vanya and Scales
statement:
Vanya has a scales for weighing loads and weights of masses grams where
is some integer not less than (exactly one weight of each nominal
value). Vanya wonders whether he can weight an item with mass using the
given weights, if the weights can be put on both pans of the scales.
Formally speaking, your task is to determine whether it is possible to
place an item of mass and some weights on the left pan of the scales,
and some weights on the right pan of the scales so that the pans of the
scales were in balance.
